tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv

@tayz_BETH @iancollinsuk @talkRADIO @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 Walleys Landfill is @EnvAgency @PHE_uk a environmental & health crisis - the health concerns grow as do the nose bleeds, the nausea, the sore throats- Newcastle under Lyme is gassed daily #stopthestink

@scottdegg @tayz_BETH @iancollinsuk @talkRADIO @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @PHE_uk Thank you Ian Collins, it‚Äôs as bad as everyone says, please keep pushing this, so many people feel helpless, so many children are ill, we don‚Äôt know what else we can do #stopthestink
@HelenVi00175623 @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency It's terrible, exhausting, and completely unacceptable üòî I hope you're able to get at least some sleep tonight üôè‚ù§Ô∏è
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency Again tonight so 3 days continual at a 6 rating in Knutton this can't go on.
@maricaoneill @Helen_Clinton @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @BorisJohnson Honestly feels like this case is going to be quoted in years to come as an unavoidable disaster.

tweets.text: Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! @DefraGovUK  @MPGeorgeEustice you must now take your sponsorship of @EnvAgency seriously and step in and act. This systemic poisoning of N-u-L by toxic LFG cannot continue any longer someone will die. They have failed to protect and act. @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL https://t.co/8O7Nve5Xot

@DefraGovUK & @MPGeorgeEustice need to take swift action. The @EnvAgency have shown that they are out of their depth& no longer objective. We need third party independent assessment of this situation& a public enquiry into the regulator @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink https://t.co/4qKnLRdLOh
